name: Remnants (itch) (jayemms98)
description:
“What do we leave behind, as people? And... how does that affect those that come after us?”

Spirits roam the land, they are the remainder of the lives they led. 

A man travels to an abandoned town, looking for an old man, his grandfather, to see why his family is the way it is, to get closure on something held over his head for the longest time.

------------------------------------------------

Our team of 3 created a short walking simulator using Unreal Engine 4.
